00106 void invoke_class() {
00107         jclass cls;
00108         jclass startcls;
00109         jmethodID mainMethod;
00110         jmethodID runMethod;
00111         jobjectArray applicationArgs;
00112         jstring applicationArg0;
00113 cout<<"0"<<endl;
00114         applicationArgs = env->NewObjectArray( 1, env->FindClass( "java/lang/String"), NULL);
00115         applicationArg0 = env->NewStringUTF( "From-C-program");
00116         env->SetObjectArrayElement(applicationArgs, 0, applicationArg0);
00117         
00118 cout<<"1 "<<env<<endl;
00119         cls = env->FindClass( "javaapplication4/Main");
00120         if (cls ==0){
00121          if (env->ExceptionOccurred()) {
00122                env->ExceptionDescribe();
00123             }
00124          exit(-1);
00125         }
00126 cout<<"2 class "<<cls<<endl;
00127         startcls = env->FindClass( "javaapplication4/start");
00128         if (startcls ==0){
00129          if (env->ExceptionOccurred()) {
00130                env->ExceptionDescribe();
00131             }
00132          exit(-1);
00133         }
00134 cout<<"2 startclass "<<startcls<<endl;
00135 
00136     jmethodID cons = env->GetMethodID(cls, "<init>", "()V");
00137 cout<<"a"<<endl;
00138     jobject obj = env->NewObject(cls, cons);
00139 cout<<"b"<<endl;
00140         mainMethod = env->GetStaticMethodID( cls, "main", "([Ljava/lang/String;)V");
00141         runMethod = env->GetMethodID( cls, "run", "()V");
00142 cout<<"c "<<mainMethod<<endl;
00143         if (runMethod==0) {
00144             if (env->ExceptionOccurred()) {
00145                env->ExceptionDescribe();
00146             }
00147             exit(-1);
00148         }
00149 
00150     startcons = env->GetMethodID(startcls, "<init>", "()V");
00151     startobj = env->NewObject(startcls, startcons);
00152     openMethod = env->GetMethodID( startcls, "open", "()V");
00153     setImage = env->GetMethodID(startcls,"setImage","(Ljava/lang/String;)V");
00154 
00155     cout<<"c "<<openMethod<<endl;
00156         if (openMethod==0) {
00157             if (env->ExceptionOccurred()) {
00158                env->ExceptionDescribe();
00159             }
00160             exit(-1);
00161         }
00162         if (setImage==0) {
00163             if (env->ExceptionOccurred()) {
00164                env->ExceptionDescribe();
00165             }
00166             exit(-1);
00167         }
00168 cout<<"precall"<<endl;
00169         env->CallVoidMethod(startobj,openMethod);
00170 
00171 
00172         //env->CallStaticVoidMethod( cls, mainMethod, applicationArgs);
00173 cout<<"callvoidmethod"<<endl;
00174         //env->CallVoidMethod( cls, runMethod);
00175 cout<<"3 class "<<cls<<endl;
00176 
00177 }

00220   mDataCam.SetFy(838.6889);

00223   mDataCam.frame_width=640;
00224   mDataCam.frame_height=480;

00233   double dist[4];
00234   dist[0]=0;
00235   dist[1]=0;
00236   dist[2]=0.;
00237   dist[3]=0.;
00238 
00239   CvMat *distMat;
00240   distMat = cvCreateMat(4,1,CV_32FC1);
00241 
00242   for ( int i=0;i<4;i++) cvmSet(distMat,i,0,dist[i]);
00243 
00244   cvCopy(distMat,mDataCam.distortion);
00245 
00246   CvMat *rotation;
00247   CvMat *trans ,*trans2;
00248   rotation=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00249   trans=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00250   trans2=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00251 
00252   if (mVehicle.getMeasurementNum()==0){
00253     cvmSet(rotation,0,0,0);
00254     cvmSet(rotation,1,0,0);
00255     cvmSet(rotation,2,0,0);
00256     cvmSet(trans,0,0,0);
00257     cvmSet(trans,1,0,0);
00258     cvmSet(trans,2,0,0);
00259   }else{        
00260     CvMat *temp=mVehicle.getMeasurementVector();
00261     cvmSet(rotation,0,0,cvmGet(temp,3,0));
00262     cvmSet(rotation,1,0,cvmGet(temp,4,0));
00263     cvmSet(rotation,2,0,cvmGet(temp,5,0)); 
00264     cvmSet(trans,0,0,cvmGet(temp,0,0));
00265     cvmSet(trans,1,0,cvmGet(temp,1,0));
00266     cvmSet(trans,2,0,cvmGet(temp,2,0));
00267   }
00268   mDataCam.SetRotation(rotation);
00269   mDataCam.SetTranslation(trans);
00270 
00271   pTracker->setDataCam(&mDataCam);
00272   pTracker->setMap(&mMap);
00273 
00274 }

00277 {
00278   //Arbrir video para captura
00279   if (argc < 2)
00280     {

00283     }
00284

00286   //capture = cvCreateFileCapture(  "/media/WOXTER/airview/valdelaguna/vuelo-1/crop120sec.mpg");
00287   capture = cvCreateFileCapture( argv[1]);
00288   if (capture==0)
00289   {
00290    cout<< "no se puede abrir el fichero de video "<<endl;
00291    video = false ;
00292   }else
00293   {
00294     video = true; 
00295   }
00296 
00297   //abrir una ventana para visualizar
00298   cvNamedWindow( "CamShiftDemo", 1 );
00299   if (video == true ) {
00300      //obtencion del primer fram
00301      frame = cvQueryFrame( capture );
00302   }else {  
00303      char filein[400];
00304      sprintf(filein,DATA,iter);
00305      printf("%s\n",filein);
00306      frame=cvLoadImage(filein,CV_LOAD_IMAGE_COLOR );
00307   }
00308   frameold = cvCloneImage(frame);
00309   framecopy=cvCreateImage(cvGetSize(frame),8,3);//copia para poder tocar
00310   cvCopy( frame,framecopy);
00311

00315 void init_ptos()
00316 {
00317   if (video == true ) {
00318      //obtencion del primer fram
00319      frame = cvQueryFrame( capture );
00320   }else {  
00321      char filein[400];
00322      sprintf(filein,DATA,iter);
00323      printf("%s\n",filein);
00324      frame=cvLoadImage(filein,CV_LOAD_IMAGE_COLOR );
00325   }
00326 
00327    cvCopy( frame,framecopy);
00328 
00329    mUpdater.Add(frame,frameold);
00330 
00331    //inicializacion de la posición de la camara con funciones de opencv
00332    cout <<"marcas visibles en init "<<mMap.visible<<endl;
00333 
00334    CvMat *h;
00335    h=cvCreateMat(3,1,CV_32FC1);
00336 
00337    for   (list<CElempunto*>::iterator It=mMap.bbdd.begin();It != mMap.bbdd.end();It++)
00338    {
00339      mModelCam.cvInverseParam(&h,(*It)->pto);
00340      (*It)->wx=cvmGet(mDataCam.translation,0,0);
00341      (*It)->wy=cvmGet(mDataCam.translation,1,0);
00342      (*It)->wz=cvmGet(mDataCam.translation,2,0);
00343      (*It)->theta=atan2(-cvmGet(h,1,0),sqrt(cvmGet(h,0,0)*cvmGet(h,0,0)+cvmGet(h,2,0)*cvmGet(h,2,0)));
00344      (*It)->phi=atan2(cvmGet(h,0,0),cvmGet(h,2,0));
00345      (*It)->rho=1./RHO_INIT_DIST;
00346      (*It)->state=st_inited;
00347      mMap.inited++;
00348    }
00349 
00350    cout<<"kalman ini"<<endl;
00351    mEstimator.initState();
00352    cout<<"kalman inited"<<endl;
00353 
00354 }
